original_text: Traders came to you from Rhodes and from other countries beside the sea. They paid you with ivory and with ebony wood. 27: Ebony is a hard black wood. Traders came to you from Rhodes and from other countries beside the sea. They paid you with ivory and with ebony wood.
korean_text: 드단 사람은 네 상인이 되었음이여 여러 섬이 너와 거래하여 상아와 박달나무를 네 물품과 바꾸어 갔도다

sentences.original_text: Traders came to you from Rhodes
and from other countries beside the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바닷가에 있는 다른 나라들에서 왔다

sentences.original_text: Ebony is a hard black wood
Traders came to you from Rhodes
and from other countries beside the sea
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 바닷가에 있는 다른 나라들에서 왔다
